The occupational health physician's tools concern :

1. employee health monitoring, organised in partnership with occupational health nurses (see specific objective)

2. actions in the field, organised in partnership with the multidisciplinary team (workstation studies, adaptation of workstations, advice on preventing occupational risks)

question.title: What are the occupational health physician's tools?
question.description: The occupational health physician's tools concern :

option_a.title: Only monitoring employee health through occupational health nurses
option_a.description: The occupational health physician's tools concern only monitoring employee health through occupational health nurses

option_b.title: Only actions in the field with the multidisciplinary team
option_b.description: The occupational health physician's tools concern only actions in the field with the multidisciplinary team

option_c.title: Both monitoring employee health and actions in the field with the multidisciplinary team
option_c.description: The occupational health physician's tools concern both monitoring employee health and actions in the field with the multidisciplinary team

option_d.title: Neither monitoring employee health nor actions in the field with the multidisciplinary team
option_d.description: The occupational health physician's tools concern neither monitoring employee health nor actions in the field with the multidisciplinary team
